A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a piece of trash\, that somehow got greenlit\, and filmed. It seems as if nobody even bothered to read the script\, or just didn't care. Pretty visuals mean nothing if your story breaks established lore\, isn't funny\, forces humor\, deletes lightsabers to 'save' a hero\, and destroys a major infuential character\, not only in the movies\, but also in rea life.
